skills.skill: IP based Voice Services in a TEAMs environment
Voice Tools to support Voice Environment

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop reference architectures and support existing standards through a comprehensive review process.
Diagnose complex technical issues and lead troubleshooting calls as an escalation point for Voice.
Identify and recommend new technology and value to the organization and educate team members as needed.
Lead technology evaluations and provide expertise on application integration, design, security, and reliability.
Manage the designs and implementation of voice-based solutions or modifications for the Enterprise.
Prepare and maintain detailed project plans, scopes of work, and technical documentation of the enterprise voice network.
Participate in the ongoing support and maintenance of existing voice infrastructure and perform complex problem isolation within the voice infrastructure.
Participate in after-hours on-call support and in an advisory role with other IT and business-based groups.
Develop and recommend strategies for growth, direction, and other enhancements by maximizing functionality of voice infrastructure.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology (Master's preferred)
